title: Advancing Microscopy through the Synergy of Human Expertise, LLM efficiency, and API Enabled Automation
content: Microscopy has been pivotal in improving our understanding of structure-function relationships at the nanoscale and is by now ubiquitous in most characterization labs, yet traditional microscopy operations have been largely limited by a manual, human-centric approach. We introduce the combination of application program interface (API) with large language models (LLMs) to address these limitations [1]. We use AEcroscoPy [2]—a cross platform Python application program interface (API) for automating microscopy experiments with enhanced efficiency, scope, effectiveness, and reproducibility of experiments—to demonstrate the synergy of human expertise, AI efficiency, and API automation for accelerating scientific discovery.
